definitions.definition: The act of commending ; praise ; favorable representation in words; recommendation .
That which is the ground of approbation or praise .
A message of affection or respect ; compliments ; greeting .
An award or recognition for performance ; a medal .

main_definition: The act of commending ; praise ; favorable representation in words; recommendation .
secondary_definitions: That which is the ground of approbation or praise .

An award or recognition for performance ; a medal .
